gate.groovy

Class GroovySupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.util.AbstractFeatureBearer
      • gate.creole.AbstractResource
        • gate.groovy.GroovySupport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gate.gui.ActionsPublisher, gate.Resource, gate.util.FeatureBearer, gate.util.NameBearer, Serializable

    @CreoleResource(name="Groovy support for GATE",
                isPrivate=true,
                tool=true,
                autoinstances=)
public class GroovySupport
extends gate.creole.AbstractResource
implements gate.gui.ActionsPublisher
    Tool resource that sets up Groovy support for GATE. When the Groovy plugin is loaded an instance of this resource is created, which (a) adds a menu item to GATE Developer to run the Groovy console and (b) mixes in the static methods of Utils and GateGroovyMethods so they can be used as instance methods by any Groovy code that runs after the plugin is loaded.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
